product_design.name: User-Centered Design Framework
product_design.description: Focus on understanding user needs, pain points, and behaviors throughout the design process.
key_points: Start with user research and empathy mapping
Define clear user personas and their goals
Create user journey maps to identify opportunities
Iterate based on user feedback and testing

product_design.name: CIRCLES Method
product_design.description: A structured approach for product design questions covering all key aspects.
key_points: Identify the customer and their needs
Report customer needs and pain points

product_strategy.name: Value-Based Pricing Framework
product_strategy.description: Price based on the value delivered to customers rather than cost-plus or competitor-based pricing.
key_points: Quantify the ROI your product delivers
Segment customers by willingness to pay
Create pricing tiers aligned with value metrics
Use value conversations in sales process

metrics.name: Data-Driven Decision Framework
metrics.description: Systematic approach to analyze data and derive insights for informed product decisions.

behavioral.name: STAR Method Framework
behavioral.description: Structure behavioral interview responses effectively to showcase your experience clearly.

guestimation.name: Fermi Estimation Framework
guestimation.description: Break down complex estimations into manageable components for systematic problem-solving.

problem_solving.name: Structured Problem Solving Framework
problem_solving.description: Systematic approach to complex problem analysis to ensure comprehensive solutions.
key_points: Clarify the problem statement and scope
Identify root causes using 5 Whys or fishbone

product_improvement.name: Product Improvement Framework
product_improvement.description: Iterative approach to enhancing existing products through systematic identification and prioritization.
key_points: Identify pain points and improvement opportunities
Prioritize based on user impact and effort
Iterate based on user feedback and data
